SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I thought my story was over for sure this
time. But thanks to you, the legend of
Benny continues!
GoodBye02:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I'm still chasing down the mystery of
those <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff> that appeared after
the Upheaval.<sp:0:4:0>I've already found the one in this area,
so as long as I'm here, I'm delving into
the mystery of the <clr:0000>dragons<clr:ffff>.
Talk03_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive_00>Want to hear something unbelievable?<sp:5:0:0>
There are people who claim to have 
scavenged pieces of a dragon's body.<sp:0:4:0>They say they found them at the end of
a trail of light falling from a dragon that
was dancing through the sky.<sp:0:4:0>The stories of what they found vary. I've
heard of folks recovering <clr:0000>scales<clr:ffff>...<clr:0000><sp:5:0:0>claws<clr:ffff>...<clr:0000>
<sp:5:0:0>fangs<clr:ffff>...and <clr:0000>horns<clr:ffff> too.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>Oh, and some kind of <clr:0000>shiny rock<clr:ffff>? <sp:5:0:0>Not
sure what body part that'd come from.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Ease_00>Dragons are supposed to be immense in
size, so I bet even a little chunk of their
bodies would be big to you and me.
Talk03_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>Some people claim to have scavenged
dragon parts. <sp:5:1:0>They've found <clr:0000>scales<clr:ffff>...<sp:5:0:0><clr:0000>
claws<clr:ffff>...<clr:0000><sp:5:0:0>fangs<clr:ffff>...<clr:0000>horns<clr:ffff>...even <clr:0000>shiny rocks<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Those who recovered one say they found
it at the end of a trail of light falling from
a dragon dancing through the sky.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>These pieces left behind are like a
message from the dragons! <sp:5:1:0>Doesn't the
idea fill you with the spirit of adventure?
Thanks01:
<sp:3:0:2:0100>Thanks for the save! <sp:5:0:0>This isn't much of
a reward, but I hope it helps.
Atacked00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I don't know where you came from, but
I'm glad you're here! Can you help me out
with this monster problem?
Talk01_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>The latest I've heard is that some people
have seen dragons dancing in the sky
before <clr:0000>disappearing into the earth<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>And on the flipside, others say they've
seen dragons <clr:0000>rising up out of the ground<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>What do you think that's about?<sp:0:4:0>If the dragons are on the surface, they
should be easy to spot. <sp:5:1:0>Guess this dragon
mystery has more depth than I thought.
Talk99:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>You a wanderer too? <sp:5:1:0>I hear a lot on my
travels. Is there some mystery I can help
you get to the bottom of?
Talk100:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:LaughS_00>Chatting with you has got me fired up with
the spirit of inquiry!<sp:0:4:0>I'm gonna head out again after resting for
a bit. <sp:5:0:0>Hope to see you around!
Atacked01:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>Come on! This is no time for a pleasant
chat! We have to do something about the
monster problem first!
Talk01_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I've heard of folks witnessing dragons
both <clr:0000>disappearing into the earth<clr:ffff> and
<clr:0000>flying up out of the ground.<sp:0:4:0><clr:ffff>No wonder dragons are hard to find if
they're not always on the surface. <sp:5:0:0>Seems
there's some real depth to this mystery.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>Dragons really do embody the spirit of
adventure. <sp:5:1:0>There's no end to my curiosity
about them!
Talk99_01: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Oh, hey, it's you! <sp:5:1:0>And so we meet again.
AfterFailed:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oof... <sp:5:0:0>I'm still seeing stars. <sp:5:1:0>Sorry, but can
you give me some space?
Failed00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh no, oh no... <sp:5:0:0>If I fell here, I'd never get
to the bottom of the world's mysteries.<sp:0:4:0>Thank goodness I'm still alive.
SavedLv2_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS>Just what are you made of?! <sp:5:1:0>You're no
slouch in combat, but you seem so calm
about it. <sp:5:0:0>Very mysterious!
Failed01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Yikes. <sp:5:0:0>I know danger comes with the
territory for adventurers like us, but that
was too close for comfort.
GoodBye00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_00>Are you a traveler? You seem to know
how to handle yourself in a fight.
After00:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>I came because I heard that one of the
<clr:0000>geoglyphs <clr:ffff>that started showing up all
over after the Upheaval is around here.<sp:0:4:0>But I've been up and down these hills,
and haven't found it yet. <sp:5:1:0>Maybe I need
to change my approach.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive_00>I could try climbing up to a <clr:0000>high place<clr:ffff>
and looking down, or even just standing
in one spot and <clr:0000>looking all around me<clr:ffff>.
Talk02_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:TalkPositive>I've heard about more than one dragon
supposedly out there. They all have
unique shapes and appearances.<sp:0:4:0>I've spoken to eyewitnesses who've seen
<clr:0000>three types<clr:ffff>: <sp:5:0:0>a red dragon, a blue dragon,
and a yellow dragon.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy>You have to take all of this with a grain of
salt, mind you. <sp:5:1:0>But that's what makes it
fun to investigate!
Talk02_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:TalkPositive>I've spoken to eyewitnesses who've seen
<clr:0000>three types<clr:ffff> of dragon: <sp:5:0:0>a red one, a blue
one, and a yellow one.<sp:0:4:0>Though who can say whether that's the
extent of it? <sp:5:1:0>A rare few claim that there's
a fourth type as well. <sp:5:0:0>Or so they think.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy>Somewhere in all that confusion, the truth
is waiting to be discovered. <sp:5:1:0>That's why
I can't get enough of mysteries!
Talk00_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm still chasing down the mystery of
those <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff> that appeared after
the Upheaval.<sp:0:4:0>I've seen the geoglyph here, <sp:5:0:0>but now I
have to decide whether to look for others
or to delve into the <clr:0000>dragon <clr:ffff>mystery.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0800>You heard about this? <sp:5:1:0>Some folks say
there are these legendary creatures called
dragons, right here in Hyrule.<sp:0:4:0>Lots of people claim to have seen one.<sp:5:0:0>
And I know they exist, because when I
was a girl, I saw one too!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>Though my memory of it is pretty
hazy.<sp:5:1:0> I must've been too awestruck
by its majesty.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000>One thing most rumors have in common is
that dragons are seen <clr:0000>flying through the
sky<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>So I should search from high ground.
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Any of that catch your interest? <sp:5:1:0>Then you
should keep an eye on the sky too!<sp:0:4:0>Well, that's all from me today. <sp:5:1:0>See you
around, I hope.
GoodBye00:
Say, are you aware of the mystery of the
<clr:0000>geoglyphs <clr:ffff>that have sprung up all over
the world after the Upheaval?<sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'm an adventurer looking into those
geoglyphs. <sp:5:0:0>Even if I haven't made much
progress yet.<sp:0:4:0>I came here because I heard that people
have seen <clr:0000>a geoglyph in the area<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>But I've walked up and down these hills
and not found any trace of it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>No use complaining though. <sp:5:0:0>I'll rest a
bit and pick up the search again soon.<sp:0:4:0>Maybe I'll see you again while I'm at it.<sp:5:0:0>
Stay safe, traveler!
Talk00_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I found the geoglyph near here, <sp:5:0:0>but I can't
make up my mind whether to look for
others or delve into the <clr:0000>dragon <clr:ffff>mystery.<sp:0:4:0>Lots of people think legendary creatures
called dragons live right here in Hyrule.<sp:0:4:0>Most rumors agree that dragons are seen
<clr:0000>flying through the sky<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:0:0>So if you're up in
the mountaintops, keep your eyes peeled!
SavedLv3_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Run_01>Yeesh! <sp:5:0:0>I didn't know if I'd make it out of
that one.
Guardian00:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:Scare>I'm out here trying to solve a mystery,
but the biggest mystery right now is what
you think you're doing!
GoodBye01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I'm still chasing down the biggest mystery
in Hyrule—the <clr:0000>geoglyphs<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>I rushed over as soon as I heard the
rumors that a geoglyph was spotted
around here.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_00>I take it that if you're here, you're after
the same thing. <sp:5:1:0>Well? <sp:5:0:0>I nailed it, didn't I?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c00><snd:QuestionNormal_00>The problem is, I've walked all around this
area but haven't found the <clr:0000>geoglyph <clr:ffff>that
brought me here.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS_01>But complaining about it won't get any
results. I'll rest for a bit and pick up the
search again soon.<sp:0:4:0>See you around! <sp:5:1:0>And best of luck in
your travels.
